"The banquet is also expensive!":
"Somehow it has gotten confusing, this festival.
It feels like it has reached the climax!
... the enemies who are interfering also understand?
If you come here, seems like the large
[Chrome Dragon] will block and confront you!
With that, at this point, you will be thrown
in as the last weapon!
Please help!
*Target Chrome Dragon of Lv.1 or higher"

"なんだかもうハチャメチャになっちゃった
お祭りも、佳境って
感じになってきたねっ！
……妨害するエネミー達もわかってるのか
ここにきて、大物の「クローム・ドラゴン」が
立ちはだかってきてるらしいのっ！
となれば、こっちも最終兵器貴方を投入！
よろしくお願いっ！
※Lv.1～のクローム・ドラゴンが対象"
